name: Billowing Skirt
components: V, S, F (a skirt, kilt, or gown)
text: A skirt, kilt, or gown you are wearing enables you to control your falls through the air. A creature wearing the enchanted item of clothing falls slowly as if affected by feather fall and can attempt a DC 15 Fly skill check as a move action to hover in place for 1 round.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材 (一件裙子、短裙或长袍)
text_zh: 一件妳穿着的裙子、短裙或长袍令你能够控制你在空中的坠落。一名生物身着被附上魔法的衣物，坠落的速度变慢，如同受到羽落术(feather fall)的影响，并且能以一个移动动作，尝试一次DC15飞行技能检定，来盘旋一轮。
